post.text: For 30 years -- 30 YEARS -- Hillary Clinton hasn't fixed anything. In fact, her only experience has been at failing. As President, believe me, there will be dramatic change. We are going to get things DONE! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Mariah
comment.text: Hillary Clinton's emails, The whole thing is a non issue that hurt no one and didnt commit any crime but you guys (the rifht wing) will do anything to discredit anyone you dont agree with like you did to Bill Clinton, Jimmy Carter and every other democrat that actual cares and makes our country a better place. Republicans only do this stuff to make it seem like dems are bad when they are actually good for america and if everyone finds out that dems help america and repubs hurt america for their own self gains then dems would have full control of the house, senate and excutive branch forever and repubs wont be able to rip everyone off for their own financial gain ever again and that scares the heck out of the scammers in the 1% so they buy these lies to discredit the left. Truth!

replies.author: Mark
replies.text: Her emails contained classified data which led to loss of life...but u say it's a non issue and not a crime...

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Did anyone actually see these emails or are you referring to the speculated versions that everyone is talking about. To my understanding, there hasn't been any actual emails published to actually say what she supposedly did.
